member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ExtensionMethods
member.summary: Provides extension methods working with JSON format.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ExtensionMethods.ToSimpleTextDocument(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.Model.Workbook,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Converts the specified workbook to a SimpleTextDocument containing its JSON representation.
member.param: The workbook to convert to a simple text document. Cannot be null.
An optional timeout that specifies the maximum duration allowed for the export operation. If null, the operation will not be cancelled.
member.returns: A SimpleTextDocument containing the JSON representation of the workbook.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings
member.summary: Provides configuration settings that control how a exports a to JSON.
member.remarks: Unless otherwise noted, all boolean properties default to a value that enables richer output (e.g. number formats, charts, summaries).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.ExportWhat
member.summary: Gets or sets which portion of the workbook will be exported (entire workbook, only the active sheet, or only a selection of ranges).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeHiddenSheets
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether hidden worksheets are included when is .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeDefinedNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether defined names (named ranges / constants) are exported.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeNumberFormats
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cell number formats (format codes other than General) are emitted.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeCharts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether charts in the exported worksheets are serialized.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.ChartDataMode
member.summary: Gets or sets how chart data should be represented (only references, only resolved values, or both).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the JSON output should be indented (pretty printed) for readability.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.ValueRenderMode
member.summary: Gets or sets how cell values are rendered in the export (raw underlying value, formatted display value, or both).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeBlankCells
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether blank cells within the used range of a worksheet should be explicitly output. When false blank cells are skipped to reduce JSON size.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeWorkbookProtectionFlag
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the workbook protection flag () is included.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeActiveSheet
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the name of the active worksheet is exported in the metadata section.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.SelectedRanges
member.summary: Gets the collection of ranges to export when is . If the collection is empty the active worksheet is exported instead.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeChartStats
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether per-series statistical aggregates (min, max, average, sum, standard deviation, count) are included for chart data.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeChartSummaries
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a human-readable summary string is generated for each chart.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonExportSettings.IncludeChartTrends
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a simple trend classification (increasing / decreasing / flat) is exported for eligible series.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ChartDataMode
member.summary: Specifies how chart series data should be represented in the exported JSON.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ChartDataMode.ReferencesOnly
member.summary: Only the formula / reference expressions are exported; literal value arrays are omitted.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ChartDataMode.ResolvedValues
member.summary: Only resolved literal values are exported; formula / reference expressions are omitted.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ChartDataMode.Both
member.summary: Both reference expressions and resolved values are exported for each data channel.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ValueRenderMode
member.summary: Specifies which representation(s) of cell values are exported.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ValueRenderMode.Raw
member.summary: Export the underlying raw value (e.g. numeric serial date, unformatted number, formula text without its formatted display form).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ValueRenderMode.Display
member.summary: Export the formatted display value (e.g. date string, number with applied format, formatted formula result).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.ValueRenderMode.Both
member.summary: Export both raw and display representations when applicable.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider
member.summary: A workbook format provider that exports spreadsheet content to a structured JSON representation. This provider is export-only; importing JSON back into a workbook is not supported.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with default .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.Name
member.summary: Gets the provider name.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.FilesDescription
member.summary: Gets a human-readable description of the file type handled by this provider.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.SupportedExtensions
member.summary: Gets the set of supported file extensions (currently only ".json").

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.CanExport
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether export is supported (always true).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.CanImport
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether import is supported (always false for this provider).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.ExportSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the export settings controlling JSON output. If null at export time, defaults are applied.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.ExportOverride(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.Model.Workbook,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Exports the specified to the output using .

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.ExportOverride(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.Model.Workbook,System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Performs the export operation writing a JSON representation of into .
member.param: Token used to observe cancellation requests.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.ImportOverride(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Import is not supported and always throws .

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.JsonFormatProvider.ImportOverride(System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Import with cancellation is not supported and always throws .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.Serialization.IJsonExportContext.SelectedRanges
member.summary: Selection ranges that should be exported when ExportWhat.Selection is used. This will be null for other export modes.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Json.Serialization.Inspection.CellValueInspector
member.summary: Extracts a lightweight value snapshot from a cell without allocating heavy objects.
